abstract: Bodies of Amedy Coulibaly and brothers Cherif and Said Kouachi, terrorists killed in separate standoffs in Paris, remain unclaimed in police morgue; France often offers Muslim burial even to criminals but French prosecutor has not made such request and family members have not made clear how they want to handle the burials.
lead_paragraph: The burial of the three raises a difficult question for France, which in the past has offered a Muslim burial even to those who committed terrorist acts.

byline.original: By MAÏA de la BAUME and DAN BILEFSKY

snippet: The burial of the three raises a difficult question for France, which in the past has offered a Muslim burial even to those who committed terrorist acts.

headline.main: Bodies of French Gunmen Lie Unburied, and, It Appears, Mostly Unwanted
headline.print_headline: Bodies of French Gunmen Lie Unburied, and, It Appears, Mostly Unwanted
